job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to creating and answering computer science-related questions to aid in training AI models, which falls under the core activities of model training and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking AI-generated code is a form of model assessment and refinement, which is a key component of the modeling process.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on training generative AI models by creating and evaluating prompts/code. However, it lacks specific details about building, fine-tuning, or deploying production-grade GenAI applications, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer. The tasks described are more aligned with data labeling or prompt engineering support rather than core engineering.
